content: {"name": "Community Health Action of Staten Island (CHASI) - SNAP Assistance", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate!
